title: Gamified Mobile Game Design for Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic computational skills and secondary-level mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: An environment enabling collaboration and competition modes using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners improve arithmetic operation (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division) problem-solving speed by 30%
Learners demonstrate strategic problem-solving capabilities with peers through collaborative modes in gamified environments
Learners experience a learning environment that stimulates situational interest and intrinsic motivation through competitive modes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
